TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InputScopeNameValue extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the input scope name which modifies how input from alternative input methods is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName> enumeration provides a set of pre-defined <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScopePhrase.Name%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScopePhrase> class.
